Package org.ligoj.app.resource.plugin

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HttpResponseCallback
    CloseableHttpResponse callback used for each response whatever the status.
    LongTaskRunner<T extends AbstractLongTask<L,I>,R extends LongTaskRepository<T,L,I>,L extends org.springframework.data.domain.Persistable<I>,I extends java.io.Serializable,A extends org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<L,I>>
    A resource running some long task.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConfiguredServicePlugin<C extends PluginConfiguration>
    Base implementation of a configurable ServicePlugin without action.
    AbstractServicePlugin
    Base implementation of ServicePlugin without action.
    AbstractToolPluginResource
    Basic implementation of a tool plug-in.
    AbstractXmlApiToolPluginResource Deprecated
    Use XmlUtils component instead.
    AtlassianVersion
    Atlassian product version retrieved from REST API.
    AuthCurlProcessor
    Basic authenticated CURL processor.
    BitBucketTag
    BitBucket named value retrieved from REST API.
    BitBucketTags
    BitBucket values retrieved from REST API.
    CurlCacheToken
    A a cache manager for token used by the CurlProcessor
    CurlProcessor
    CURL processor.
    CurlProcessor.TrustedX509TrustManager
    Dummy SSL manager.
    CurlRequest
    HTTP query to execute.
    DefaultHttpResponseCallback
    The default callback implementation.
    HeaderHttpResponseCallback
    This callback get the header from the response.
    OnlyRedirectHttpResponseCallback
    Only accept 302.
    PluginsClassLoader
    Class Loader which load jars in "plugins" directory inside the home directory.
    SessionAuthCurlProcessor
    Basic authenticated CURL processor where credentials are only sent one in order to get a session cookie.
    VersionUtils
    Version utilities.
    XmlUtils
    XML utilities.
